snippet: Pasta makers are facing the highest costs in four years, which will probably be passed on to consumers in the form of higher prices.
abstract: Harvest of durum crop, type of wheat used for pasta, is the smallest in 13 years; pasta makers face highest costs in four years as a result, which will probably be passed on to consumers in form of higher prices.
lead_paragraph: Pasta makers are facing the highest costs in four years, which will probably be passed on to consumers in the form of higher prices.

headline.main: Bad News for Pasta Lovers in Durum Wheat Harvest
headline.print_headline: Bad News for Pasta Lovers in Durum Wheat Harvest
